column4: I got the Ubuntu download and burned it to a CD, but when i booted it on my older computer, it didn't have an option for Live CD, just to install. So I did, and now when I start it up, I don't see any GUI.

Can someone help me? I got the Ubuntu download and burned it to a CD, but when i booted it on my older computer, it didn't have an option for Live CD, just to install. So I did, and now when I start it up, I don't see any GUI.
I guess everyone's too busy to help me.
